name: Hard Core (itch)
description:
Granny Smith's looming medical bills about to open a can of worms on your wallet?

Here's the in-cider scoop on this ap-peeling game:

When life ain't peachy keen, don't eat sour grapes--get revenge. You know what they say, one bad apple spoils the barrel. Turret barrel that is! The apple may not fall far from the tree, but who cares when you can shoot it across the orchard? An apple a day keeps the doctor away--throw it hard enough, and it might be permanent. You're the boss applesauce. Place turrets, hit doctors, gain points in this tower defense game. 

How do you like them apples?

GameOff 2022 Submission 

Credits: Bridget, Scott T, Mojo, Daniel
